cat_feature_intro.experience_level: | experience_level   | The experience level in the job during the year with the following possible values: EN Entry-level / Junior MI Mid-level / Intermediate SE Senior-level / Expert EX Executive-level / Director |
cat_feature_intro.employment_type: | employment_type    | The type of employement for the role: PT Part-time FT Full-time CT Contract FL Freelance                                                                                                       |
cat_feature_intro.job_title: | job_title          | The role worked in during the year.                                                                                                                                                            |
cat_feature_intro.salary_currency: | salary_currency    | The currency of the salary paid as an ISO 4217 currency code.                                                                                                                                  |
cat_feature_intro.employee_residence: | employee_residence | Employee's primary country of residence in during the work year as an ISO 3166 country code.                                                                                                   |
cat_feature_intro.company_location: | company_location   | The country of the employer's main office or contracting branch as an ISO 3166 country code.                                                                                                   |
cat_feature_intro.company_size: | company_size       | The average number of people that worked for the company during the year: S less than 50 employees (small) M 50 to 250 employees (medium) L more than 250 employees (large)                    |

num_feature_intro.work_year: | work_year          | The year the salary was paid.                                                                                                                                                                  |
num_feature_intro.salary: | salary_in_usd      | The salary in USD (FX rate divided by avg. USD rate for the respective year via fxdata.foorilla.com).                                                                                          |
num_feature_intro.salary_in_usd: | salary_in_usd      | The salary in USD (FX rate divided by avg. USD rate for the respective year via fxdata.foorilla.com).                                                                                          |
num_feature_intro.remote_ratio: | remote_ratio       | The overall amount of work done remotely, possible values are as follows: 0 No remote work (less than 20%) 50 Partially remote 100 Fully remote (more than 80%)                                |
